channel.description: Recent content in dutch on RobinCamarasa

item.title: I pass the Dutch highschool exam
item.description: In this serie of post, I will document my journey toward getting the highest dutch highschool level degree: the VWO diploma. I give myself two years to do it. Motivation Why do I do that? I mean I don’t need it. I am currently completing my PhD and already have a French highschool degree, so it is really not needed. My first motivation is to up my game in dutch. Currently I have a B1/B2 level, but have a lot of difficulty to go to the next level.
